thread.title: Emma Stone Wore a Planned Parenthood Pin to the 2017 Oscars | InStyle.com
thread.title_full: Emma Stone Wore a Planned Parenthood Pin to the 2017 Oscars | InStyle.com

author: Olivia Bahou
title: Emma Stone Wore a Planned Parenthood Pin to the 2017 Oscars | InStyle.com
text:
by: Olivia Bahou 
When Emma Stone hit the red carpet at the 2017 Oscars , all eyes were on the swingy, layered fringe at the bottom of her Givenchy Haute Couture gown, but the most powerful part of her dress was actually way up by the straps. The Best Actress nominee accessorized with a gold Planned Parenthood pin on her left lapel, expressing her solidarity with the organization in a big way. George Pimentel/FilmMagic 
The La La Land star isnâ€™t the only celebrity who made a political statement on the red carpet at the 89th annual Academy Awards. Dakota Johnson also represented Planned Parenthood with her clutch, adding the label onto her Gucci bag.
